page.title: 05SARAH GETS READY FOR SCHOOL
page.content: It is a Monday.I wake up at 7 o'clock.Then I go downstairs and have my breakfast.Sometimes I have cornflakes or rice krispies.I turn on the radio,I listen to music and sit down to eat.Then I go upstairs into the bathroom and wash.I go into my room,get out my clothes and get dressed .I wear a dress.Then I go into my mum's room and drink my tea.Then I sit on the stool to brush my hair.Then my mum combs my hair and puts plaits in my hair.Then I go into the bathroom and clean my teeth.I go back downstairs and get my coat on,get my bag and go outside.I go past the car and out of the gate and past the restaurant I turn a corner and past the cross then I'm at school.I go in the gates and go in the classroom.I put my bag away.Then I go outside and wait for my friends Lorraine and Emma.
